src:
Solskj√¶r hadde god grunn til √• glise: ‚Äì Det var stort
Manchester United knuste Partizan og er sikret avansement i Europa League.
07 Nov 2019, 21:53 by Lars S√∏rnes

MANCHESTER UNITED - PARTIZAN BEOGRAD 3‚Äì0

Ole Gunnar Solskj√¶rs menn tok en enkel trepoenger i Europa League torsdag kveld. Gjestene fra Beograd ble sendt hjem med et trem√•lstap i bagasjen.

‚Äì Det var stort √• se s√• mange smilende fjes. Vi kunne ha scoret mange flere m√•l, men det var en god prestasjon, og vi er henrykt over √• v√¶re kvalifisert for cupspillet, sa Solskj√¶r etter kampen, if√∏lge NTB.

‚Äì Det som gleder meg mest er tre poeng og at vi g√•r videre i gruppen. M√•ten vi gikk inn i kampen p√• var ogs√• gledelig - spillerne senket skuldrene, spilte fin fotball og skapte mange sjanser, sa en forn√∏yd Solskj√¶r til TV 2 etter kampen.
Manchester United kunne vunnet med b√•de fire og fem m√•l, og nordmannen mente Partizan ga mannskapet hans mye rom utover i kampen.
‚Äì Vi tok vare p√• rommene vi fikk, men vi avsluttet ikke alltid like bra. N√•r vi scorer tre og ikke slipper inn, kan vi ikke klage, sa han til TV 2.

Fakta: Europa League torsdag, 4. runde:


Gruppe D:


Rosenborg ‚Äì Sporting Lisboa (Portugal) 0-2 (0-2), LASK (√òsterrike) ‚Äì PSV Eindhoven (Nederland) 4-1 (0-1).


Gruppe A:


APOEL (Kypros) ‚Äì Qarabag (Kasakhstan) 2-1 (0-1), Dudelange (Luxembourg) ‚Äì Sevilla (Spania) 2-5 (0-4).


Gruppe B:


FC K√∏benhavn (Danmark) ‚Äì Dinamo Kiev (Ukraina) 1-1 (1-0), Lugano (Sveits) ‚Äì Malm√∂ (Sverige) 0-0.


Gruppe C:


Basel (Sveits) ‚Äì Getafe (Spania) 2-1 (1-1), Krasnodar (Russland) ‚Äì Trabzonspor (Tyrkia) 3-1 (2-0).


Gruppe E:


Cluj (Romania) ‚Äì Rennes (Frankrike) 1-0- (0-0), Lazio (Italia) ‚Äì Celtic (Skottland) 1-2 (1-1).


Gruppe F:


Standard Li√®ge (Belgia) ‚Äì Eintracht Frankfurt (Tyskland) 2-1 (0-0).
Spilt onsdag: Vit√≥ria Guimar√£es (Portugal) ‚Äì Arsenal (England) 1-1.


Gruppe G:


Feyenoord (Nederland) ‚Äì Young Boys (Sveits) 1-1 (1-0), Rangers (Skottland) ‚Äì Porto (Portugal) 2-0 (0-0).


Gruppe H:


Espanyol (Spania) ‚Äì Ludogorets (Bulgaria) 6-0 (3-0), Ferencvaros (Ungarn) ‚Äì CSKA Moskva (Russland) 0-0.


Gruppe I:


Olexandrija (Ukraina) ‚Äì Saint-√âtienne (Frankrike) 2-2 (0-1), Wolfsburg (Tyskland) ‚Äì Gent (Belgia) 1-3 (1-0).


Gruppe J:


Borussia M√∂nchengladbach (Tyskland) ‚Äì Roma (Italia) 2-1 (1-0), Wolfsberg (√òsterrike) ‚Äì Basaksehir (Tyrkia) 0-3 (0-0).


Gruppe K:


Braga (Portugal) ‚Äì Besiktas (Tyrkia) 3-1 (2-1), Wolverhampton (England) ‚Äì Slovan Bratislava (Slovakia) 1-0 (0-0).


Gruppe L:


Astana (Kasakhstan) ‚Äì AZ Alkmaar (Nederland) 0-5 (0-1), Manchester U. (England) ‚Äì Partizan Beograd (Serbia) 3-0 (2-0).


Flytr√∏bbel for United-supportere p√• Gardermoen: ‚Äì En haug med rasende folk



Unggutten Mason Greenwood sendte United i f√∏ringen.üì∑ Dave Thompson / AP

Kjempescoring av Rashford
Det var en frisk √•pning p√• oppgj√∏ret p√• Old Trafford. Begge lag hadde en ball i nettet i l√∏pet av de f√∏rste fem minuttene, men begge scoringene ble korrekt annullert for offside.
Rundt halvveis i 1. omgang gikk hjemmelaget opp i ledelsen. M√•let var signert unggutten Mason Greenwood etter at han ble spilt fri av Marcus Rashford.
I det 33. spilleminutt doblet franskmannen Anthony Martial ledelsen. Greenwood blokkerte venstreback Slobodan Urosevics klareringsfors√∏k, og ballen spratt til Martial, som med sin f√∏rste ber√∏ring lurte ballen forbi midtstopper Starhinja Pavlovic. Med sin neste driblet han av den andre stopperen Bojan Ostojic. Den tredje holdt ballen unna Pavlovic, som desperat pr√∏vde √• takle, mens den fjerde ber√∏ringen listet ballen forbi keeper Vladimir Stojkoviƒá.

Rosenborgs vonde rekke fortsetter - n√¶rmer seg negativ rekord

Flere m√•l ble det ikke i de f√∏rste 45 minuttene, og r√∏dtr√∏yene kunne g√• til pause med en fortjent 2‚Äì0-ledelse.
Allerede etter fire minutter av 2. omgang s√∏rget Marcus Rashford for 3‚Äì0 til hjemmelaget. Etter et United-angrep p√• h√∏yresiden ble ballen spilt over til kaptein Ashley Young, som trillet den innover p√• banen til Rashford. Han fikk fulltreff med venstre og s√• ballen forsvinne snorrett inn i krysset.
Manchester United kontrollerte resten av kampen, og Ole Gunnar Solskj√¶r kunne forn√∏yd konstatere at det ble en behagelig kveld p√• jobben mot Partizan Beograd.
‚Äì Partizan har v√¶rt b√•de ett, to og tre nummer for sm√• i kveld, sa TV 2s fotballkommentator Nils Johan Semb.

¬´Norske¬ª Celtic videre i Europa etter bortebragd



Marcus Rashford vartet opp med en dr√∏mmescoring.üì∑ ANDREW YATES / Reuters

Skade
Hjemmelagets Scott McTominay m√•tte for √∏vrig forlate banen med skade kvarteret f√∏r slutt. Han s√• ut til √• slite med sin h√∏yre ankel.
Manchester United, som fortsatt ikke har sluppet inn m√•l i Europa League i h√∏st, leder sin gruppe med 10 poeng etter fire spilte kamper. Laget er allerede sikret avansement i turneringen.
AZ Alkmaar, med tr√∏nderne Fredrik Midtsj√∏ og Jonas Svensson p√• laget, f√∏lger bak med 8 poeng. Partizan Beograd har 4 poeng, mens fortapte Astana st√•r med fire strake tap.

Nordmann med scoring - tok storseier i Europa
text:
Sunshine had good reason to smile: - It was big
Manchester United crushed Partizan and are secured advancement in the Europa League.
07 Nov 2019, 21:53 by Lars S√∏rnes

MANCHESTER UNITED - PARTIZAN BEOGRAD 3‚Äì0

Ole Gunnar Solsk√¶r's men took a simple three points in the Europa League on Thursday night. The guests from Belgrade were sent home with a wooden goalie in their luggage.

- It was great to see so many smiling faces. "We could have scored many more goals, but it was a good performance, and we are thrilled to be qualified for the cup game," said Solskj√¶r after the game, according to NTB.

- What pleases me most is three points and that we move on in the group. The way we entered the game was also gratifying - the players lowered their shoulders, played fine football and created many chances, a satisfied Sunsker told TV 2 after the match.
Manchester United could win by four or five goals, and the Norwegian thought Partizan gave his crew plenty of room throughout the match.
- We took care of the rooms we got, but we didn't always finish as well. When we score three and don't let in, we can't complain, he told TV 2.

Facts: Europa League Thursday, 4th round:


Group D:


Rosenborg - Sporting Lisbon (Portugal) 0-2 (0-2), LASK (Austria) - PSV Eindhoven (Netherlands) 4-1 (0-1).


Group A:


APOEL (Cyprus) - Qarabag (Kazakhstan) 2-1 (0-1), Dudelange (Luxembourg) - Seville (Spain) 2-5 (0-4).


Group B:


FC Copenhagen (Denmark) - Dinamo Kiev (Ukraine) 1-1 (1-0), Lugano (Switzerland) - Malm√∂ (Sweden) 0-0.


Group C:


Basel (Switzerland) - Getafe (Spain) 2-1 (1-1), Krasnodar (Russia) - Trabzonspor (Turkey) 3-1 (2-0).


Group E:


Cluj (Romania) - Rennes (France) 1-0- (0-0), Lazio (Italy) - Celtic (Scotland) 1-2 (1-1).


Group F:


Standard Liege (Belgium) - Eintracht Frankfurt (Germany) 2-1 (0-0).
Played Wednesday: Vit√≥ria Guimar√£es (Portugal) - Arsenal (England) 1-1.


Group G:


Feyenoord (Netherlands) - Young Boys (Switzerland) 1-1 (1-0), Rangers (Scotland) - Porto (Portugal) 2-0 (0-0).


Group H:


Espanyol (Spain) - Ludogorets (Bulgaria) 6-0 (3-0), Ferencvaros (Hungary) - CSKA Moscow (Russia) 0-0.


Group I:


Olexandrija (Ukraine) - Saint-√âtienne (France) 2-2 (0-1), Wolfsburg (Germany) - Ghent (Belgium) 1-3 (1-0).


Group J:


Borussia M√∂nchengladbach (Germany) - Rome (Italy) 2-1 (1-0), Wolfsberg (Austria) - Basaksehir (Turkey) 0-3 (0-0).


Group K:


Braga (Portugal) - Besiktas (Turkey) 3-1 (2-1), Wolverhampton (England) - Slovan Bratislava (Slovakia) 1-0 (0-0).


Group L:


Astana (Kazakhstan) - AZ Alkmaar (Netherlands) 0-5 (0-1), Manchester U. (England) - Partizan Belgrade (Serbia) 3-0 (2-0).


Flight trouble for United supporters at Gardermoen: - A bunch of furious people



Young boy Mason Greenwood sent United in the lead.üì∑ Dave Thompson / AP

Great scoring by Rashford
There was a fresh opening at the settlement at Old Trafford. Both teams had a ball in the net during the first five minutes, but both scores were properly canceled for offside.
Around halfway into the first half, the home team went up in the lead. The goal was signed young boy Mason Greenwood after he was played free by Marcus Rashford.
In the 33rd minute, Frenchman Anthony Martial doubled the lead. Greenwood blocked left-back Slobodan Urosevic's clearance attempt, and the ball bounced to Martial, who with his first touch tricked the ball past center stopper Starhinja Pavlovic. With his next, he dribbled off the second stopper Bojan Ostojic. The third kept the ball away from Pavlovic, who desperately tried to cope, while the fourth touched the ball past keeper Vladimir Stojkoviƒá.

Rosenborg's bad line continues - approaching the negative record

There were no goals in the first 45 minutes, and the Red Jerseys could break with a deserved 2-0 lead.
Already after four minutes of the second inning, Marcus Rashford provided a 3-0 to the home team. After a United attack on the right, the ball was passed to Captain Ashley Young, who wheeled it into the field to Rashford. He got hit with the left and saw the ball disappear neatly into the cross.
Manchester United controlled the rest of the match, and Ole Gunnar Solskj√¶r was pleased to note that it was a pleasant evening at work against Partizan Belgrade.
"Partizan has been one, two and three numbers for little ones tonight," said TV 2's football commentator Nils Johan Semb.

"Norwegian" Celtic continues in Europe after the disappearance



Marcus Rashford earned a dream score.oring ANDREW YATES / Reuters

Hurt
The home team's Scott McTominay had to leave the field with damage to the quarter before the end. He seemed to struggle with his right ankle.
Manchester United, who have not yet conceded goals in the Europa League this fall, are leading their squad by 10 points after four games played. The team is already secured advancement in the tournament.
AZ Alkmaar, with the trunders Fredrik Midtsj√∏ and Jonas Svensson on the team, follows with 8 points. Partizan Belgrade has 4 points, while lost Astana stands with four straight losses.

Nordmann with scoring - took big win in Europe
